story_parts.text: The lion was very excited to go to the city. He had always wanted to see what it was like. When he got there, he was amazed at all the sights and sounds. He walked around for a while, taking it all in. He even got to eat some food from a restaurant. It was a great day for the lion and he was very happy to have finally gotten to see the city.

story_parts.text: The lion gets tired and decides to go back to his home in the zoo. He has had a great time exploring the city, but he is ready to go home now. He walks back to the zoo and goes into his cage. He is happy to be home and can't wait to tell all his friends about his great adventure in the city.
